com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory

Class ItemParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.ItemParser

  • public class ItemParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Can be used to match items against, and to provide amounts. Material AIR is designated for invalid (or failed-to-parse) Item Parsers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char[] MULTIPLIER_SIGNS 
      static char STACK_MULTIPLIER

      boolean match(org.bukkit.Material type, int data) 
      ItemParser multiplyAmount(int amount)
      Multiplies the amount of this item parser with the amount specified
      If this parser has no amount, an amount of 1 is assumed, resulting in a new item parser with the specified amount
      static ItemParser parse(java.lang.String fullname)
      Supported formats: typedata: [type]:[data] [typeid]:[data] [typeid]

      Amount/name relationship: [amount]x[typedata] [amount]*[typedata] [amount] [typedata] [amount]@[typedata] [typedata]

        public ItemParser setData(int data)

      • setAmount

        Returns:
        new ItemParser with the new amount

      • multiplyAmount

        public ItemParser multiplyAmount(int amount)
        Multiplies the amount of this item parser with the amount specified
        If this parser has no amount, an amount of 1 is assumed, resulting in a new item parser with the specified amount
        Parameters:
        amount - to multiply with
        Returns:
        new Item Parser with the multiplied amount
